summary: The implementation successfully delivers all requested requirements for the Snake game. The game is built with React and TypeScript, uses Tailwind CSS for styling with a cyberpunk/neon theme, and runs entirely in the frontend. All core gameplay features are present: continuous snake movement, arrow key controls with direction reversal prevention, collision detection, score tracking, and restart functionality. The visual design includes a cohesive neon/cyberpunk theme with Chinese text, gradient backgrounds, and appropriate typography. One additional feature (pause functionality with spacebar) was implemented beyond the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Pause/resume game functionality using spacebar key
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists pause functionality in non-goals (not requested), yet the implementation includes pause state management, pause UI display, and spacebar key handling for pausing/resuming the game

hallucinated_features.description: Progressive speed increase as score increases
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention difficulty levels or speed changes, and explicitly lists 'Different difficulty levels' in non-goals. The implementation includes speed adjustment logic that increases game speed based on score
The BuildRequest does not specify language requirements. The implementation uses Chinese text throughout the UI including game title, instructions, tips, and game over screen
